The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 30 June is 44,398 (5,117.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 25 June, there were 772 new confirmed cases (89.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 June, there were 475 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 63% (297 extra cases).
